valve doesn't know how to do everything right, the selection of opponents in the game is terrible. I played with allies with the rank of silver, against me there were enemies with the titles of Master Guardian Elite.
你说的对 但是《CSGO》是由V社自主研发的一款全新开放世界冒险枪战游戏。游戏发生在一个被称作「理塘」的幻想世界，在这里被神选中的人将被授予「通透世界」，引导斑纹之力。你将扮演一位名为「s1mple」的神秘角色，在自由的旅行中邂逅性格各异、能力独特的小鸡们，和它们一起击败SQ+，找回你妈妈的吻的同时，逐步发掘「莱昂凯」的真相。
I quit after my first game, trash game
gra słaba raz 4 rosyjskie dzieci mnie wywaliły kiedy kierowałem, im gierkę.
太好玩了，就是对新手有亿点不友好，新手可以先去打平台，然后再玩官匹，不要当哑巴，素质好一点，多学道具

CS: GO also has the upper hand in terms of combat mechanics. Weapons and movement especially feel more accurate than in Fortnite and PUBG. All these factors make for a much more condensed and manageable experience. I particularly enjoy that matches tend to only take about 45 minutes from start to finish.
This game is more fun then fortnite!
I am very bad at this game but it’s better than val
YES GOOD GAME ME RECOMEND IT TO FAMILY
Хорошая  игра для совместной игры с друзьями !
